    \foreach \i [remember = \i as \lasti (initially 1)] in {2, ..., 2}

    \foreach \i [remember = \i as \lasti (initially 1)] in {2, ...,2}
    \node  [latent]  (mu_\i)  [below = 2.5em of y\i t]  {$\mu_{\i}$};

    % draw paths

    \foreach \i [remember = \i as \lasti (initially 1)] in {1, ...,2}
